title: Riot Oceanic Open Ladder Players Needed! (Jungle & Support)

embed.description: Welcome to the Oceanic Open Ladder 2017 Split 2!Make sure you have your teams ready to sign up, minimum 5 per roster to...

body:
Hello!
We are currently looking for some players to help us out with an up coming tournament. It would be greatly appreciated if any one would be able to join our team.
We are currently looking for a jungle and support player to help us out! If you are willing to help us out pleased contact me in game with the league client and well can discuss manners there. 
For any more details once again contact me for much more information within the league of legends client.

-AussiOP


Also I will update information about positions along the way within the chat section of this form.
(If needed we may be able to change some positions)

replies.body: uhhh, I don't know... want to hop in the discord with me buddy?
sure thing man, you keen for jungle or do you want to discuss a possible sub for some other role?
Hop over from na to oce buddy and play for a year then sure thing!
I'l join as support ... how do i add you in game ?
I have a expression of interest, I've added you in game.
Can I please join your team AussiOP?
If your still looking for any members I wouldn't mind joining
I heard my son was drafted to your team, may I join aswell? But is this an ARAM tournament? I only like to play ARAM.
Unfortunately we will not be taking part of any ARAM tournaments currently but later on within the future if you like we could possibly try out some ARAM tournaments! KEEN
